DOC.brief_summary: This prospective randomized control study compare laparoscopic adrenalectomy ( LA ) versus image-guided percutaneous radiofrequency ablation ( RFA ) treat aldosterone-producing adenoma . The objective study 1. compare short-term outcome LA RFA treat aldosterone-producing adenoma . 2. compare treatment success rate LA RFA follow-up primary aldosteronism .
